item.description:
Beth is going to do a raw vegan potluck/smoothie/juice event at her house this Saturday 12:00 (639 Durfee Hill Rd., Chepachet, RI 02814, cell: 499-5711).

There's a woman who's going to do a free talk about atlas profilax at 1:00 (it corrects the atlas vertebra http://www.visionmaga....

Beth has actually had it done herself and it was pretty awesome, her posture has definitely changed. But that's just an informal side thing. Between her vitamix and juicer, people could bring fruits and veggies if they wanted to, or a dish if they preferred and we could whip some things up. There are also loads of trails near Beth's house (and we have a short wooded path behind us to a lake as an alternative) and kids are welcome.

Again, this is totally last minute, but if you're interested, that would be awesome! Hope all is well and you're enjoying your summer!

group.name: Rhode Island Vegetarian and Vegan Meetup Group

item.name: Raw Vegan Potluck/Smoothie/Juice Event This Saturday at Noon!!
